info.title: Microsoft Users
info.description: Manage user profiles, organizational hierarchy, presence, and people discovery via Microsoft Graph. Enhanced alternative to Microsoft's first-party User Profile MCP Server with additional capabilities like presence, photos, and people search.

get.description: Retrieve the profile details of the signed-in user (the caller). This endpoint always returns the profile of the current user context.
Retrieve the manager of the signed-in user (the caller). This endpoint always returns the manager of the current user context.
List the direct reports of the signed-in user.
Retrieve the profile photo of the signed-in user as binary image data.
Get the presence information for the signed-in user, including availability and activity.
Search for people relevant to the signed-in user. Returns relevance-ranked results based on communication patterns, collaboration, and business relationships.
Retrieve a list of users in the organization. Supports $select, $filter, $top, $orderby, $search. ConsistencyLevel is set to eventual by default for advanced queries.
Retrieve a specified user's profile in the directory. Provide the user's object ID (GUID) or userPrincipalName (UPN). Do not use 'me' - use Get My Profile instead.
Retrieve the manager of a specified user. Provide the user's object ID (GUID) or userPrincipalName (UPN). Do not use 'me' - use Get My Manager instead.
List the direct reports of a specified user. Provide the user's object ID (GUID) or userPrincipalName (UPN). Do not use 'me'.
Retrieve the profile photo of a specified user as binary image data.
Get the presence information for a specified user, including availability and activity.

post.description: Get the presence information for multiple users at once. Provide an array of user IDs (up to 650).
Get the free/busy availability information for a set of users, distributions lists, or resources for a specified time period.

get.description: Get the groups, directory roles, and administrative units that the signed-in user is a member of.
Get the groups, directory roles, and administrative units that a user is a member of.
Retrieve a list of license details for the signed-in user, including Microsoft 365 and other subscriptions.
Retrieve a list of license details for a user.

post.description: Get the mail tips for one or more recipients. Includes out of office settings, mailbox full status, and more.

get.description: Get the Microsoft Teams teams that the signed-in user is a member of.
Get the authentication methods registered for the signed-in user (phone, email, FIDO2 keys, etc.).
Get directory objects (applications, groups, service principals) owned by the signed-in user.
Get directory objects (applications, groups, service principals) owned by a user.
Get the complete profile of the signed-in user including all sections (skills, projects, certifications, awards, positions, etc.). Uses beta endpoint.
Get the complete profile of a user including all sections. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the skills listed in the signed-in user's profile. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the skills listed in a user's profile. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the projects the signed-in user has participated in. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the projects a user has participated in. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the certifications the signed-in user has earned. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the certifications a user has earned. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the awards the signed-in user has received. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the awards a user has received. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the languages the signed-in user speaks. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the languages a user speaks. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the work positions (job history) of the signed-in user. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the work positions (job history) of a user. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the educational activities (schools, degrees) of the signed-in user. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the educational activities of a user. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the interests of the signed-in user. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the interests of a user. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the web accounts (social media, etc.) of the signed-in user. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the web accounts of a user. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the physical addresses of the signed-in user. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the physical addresses of a user. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the websites of the signed-in user. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the websites of a user. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the anniversaries (birthday, work anniversary, etc.) of the signed-in user. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the anniversaries (birthday, work anniversary, etc.) of a user. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the profile notes/annotations of the signed-in user. Uses beta endpoint.
Get the profile notes/annotations of a user. Uses beta endpoint.

post.description: Model Context Protocol endpoint for Copilot Studio agent integration. Supports initialize, tools/list, and tools/call methods.

UserIdentifierParam.name: userIdentifier
UserIdentifierParam.description: User's object ID (GUID) or userPrincipalName (UPN). Do not use 'me'.

SelectParam.name: $select
SelectParam.description: Comma-separated list of properties to return

ExpandParam.name: $expand
ExpandParam.description: Expand related entity (manager OR directReports). Only one per request.

schedules.description: Email addresses or UPNs of users to get availability for

availabilityViewInterval.description: Duration of each time slot in minutes (default 30)

emailAddresses.description: Email addresses to get mail tips for

mailTipsOptions.description: Types of mail tips: automaticReplies, customMailTip, deliveryRestriction, externalMemberCount, mailboxFullStatus, maxMessageSize, moderationStatus, recipientScope, recipientSuggestions, totalMemberCount

Profile.description: Full user profile including all sections

scopes.User.ReadBasic.All: Read basic profiles of all users

tags.name: User Profiles
tags.description: Operations for any user by ID or UPN

tags.name: Profile
tags.description: Rich profile data: skills, projects, certifications, awards

tags.name: MCP
tags.description: Model Context Protocol for Copilot Studio
